REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f2153 reute r f BC-sabena-begins-brussel 03-30 0053

TEXT.TITLE: SABENA BEGINS BRUSSELS-TORONTO SERVICE
TEXT.BODY: Sabena Belgian World Airlines said it began today three-times-weekly service between Brussels and Toronto. Sabena said it will fly combined passenger-freight flights non-stop into Toronto on Mondays and Thursdays. Sunday flights will stop in Montreal. Reuter
